--- title: Core Marketplace Requests keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Core.rq_marketplace is a collection of function wrappers around the Discogs api for marketplace interactions." ---

Inventory¶

get_inventory[source]

get_inventory(user:Union[UserWithoutAuthentication, UserWithUserTokenBasedAuthentication], username:str, status:Optional[StatusInventory]=None, page:Optional[int]=None, per_page:Optional[int]=None, sort:Optional[SortOptionsInventory]=None, sort_order:Optional[SortOrder]=None)

Get the inventory of a given user.

No user Authentication needed.

# Example for usage of get_inventory
get_inventory(user=example_user, username="Les_nuits_noires", status=StatusInventory.for_sale,
              page=1, per_page=3, sort=SortOptionsInventory.price, sort_order=SortOrder.asc)
